description:
Jonathan Groff is a name familiar to fans of the theater stage, most recently as part of the Tony Award-winning cast of Broadway's Hamilton. But for two brief seasons, he was also the star of HBO's low-rated but critically beloved comedy Looking.乔纳森•格罗夫这个名字对于舞台剧爱好者来说并不陌生，他是获得过托尼奖的百老汇汉密尔顿演员班底中一员。除此之外，他也还是HBO公司低调却饱受争议的喜剧电视《寻》中的演员。

Set within the gay community of San Francisco, the series was canceled by the network in March 2015 because it was ratings anemic, but it will return for a wrap-up film Saturday, July 23 at 10/9c.该剧背景设置在旧金山的同志群体中。2015年3月该剧曾因收视率低迷而在网络上被下架，但它将在7月23日（周六）东部时间十点中部时间九点以电影的形式回归。

After moving to Denver following his disastrous breakup with Kevin (Russell Tovey) in the Season 2 finale, Groff's Patrick will return to the City by the Bay for the wedding of best friend Agustín (Frankie J. Alvarez) and HIV-positive Eddie (Daniel Franzese). In order to move forward with his life, Patrick will have to face his complicated history with both Kevin and ex-boyfriend Richie (Raúl Castillo) and determine what he really wants.格罗夫饰演的帕特里克在第二季最后一集中因和凯文（拉塞尔·托维）分手伤心欲绝而搬往丹佛，此后他将为了好友奥古斯丁（弗兰基·J.·阿尔瓦雷斯）和感染艾滋病的艾迪（丹尼尔·弗兰兹则）而回到旧金山。为了继续其生活，帕特里克不得不面对他和凯文以及前男友里奇（劳尔·卡斯蒂略）复杂的过去，决定究竟什么才是自己说想要的。

During its brief run on HBO, Looking was praised for its ability to capture a unique point of view that also dealt in universal truths like happiness, success and a sense of purpose. The series told fascinating, personal stories that ultimately had the power to resonate with everyone, whether they were gay or straight, man or woman.在HBO的试播阶段，《寻》因能够从独特的视角捕捉到如幸福、成功、目的性等人生真谛而备受好评。该剧讲述了一个吸引人、个人化的故事，但是却能够引起每一个人的共鸣——无论你是男是女，也无论你喜欢男还是女。

You can watch the trailer for the TV movie, which also stars Murray Bartlett, Lauren Weedman and Bashir Salahuddin, above. It's not quite Groff's Tony-nominated performance as King George in Hamilton, but for fans of Looking who've been waiting more than a year for closure, it's just as good.在这部影片中，你还能看到莫瑞·巴莱特、劳伦·韦德曼和巴希尔·萨拉赫丁。和格罗夫获得托尼奖提名的表演如在百老汇中的国王乔治不同，在等了将近一年的粉丝眼中，《寻》是无与伦比的。
